Description: Green glazed composition shabti with incised detail: a lappet-wig, a face(very worn) with a beard and parallel hands in relief holding an adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the leg section is inscribed with three rows of incised Hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the foot.
Condition: poor - face and one shoulder worn
